title: Food Hygiene Ratings
promo_group_description: The information on businesses is held on behalf of local authorities in England, Northern Ireland, Wales and Scotland. Any queries about individual businesses should be directed to the appropriate local authority.
food_problems_description: Consumers, businesses and enforcers can report issues
